text: James Wilfred "Jimmy" Roberts (April 9, 1940 â€“ October 23, 2015) was a Canadian ice hockey defenceman and forward. He went by both the nicknames of Jimmy and Jim. Roberts played for the Montreal Canadiens and for the St. Louis Blues. He won two Stanley Cups during his career. He retired in 1978 after a twenty year career. Roberts died on October 23, 2015 of cancer in St. Louis, Missouri at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:St. Louis Blues players Category:Ice hockey people from Toronto
title: Jimmy Roberts
